references.reason: This paper introduces the composite objective mirror descent algorithm, a fundamental method for online composite optimization which is extended by this paper.
This paper introduces the optimistic online learning framework, which is the theoretical foundation of the OptCMD algorithm used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Between stochastic and adversarial online convex optimization: Improved regret bounds via smoothness
references.reason: This paper introduces the Stochastically Extended Adversarial model, the core setting for online optimization which this paper extends to the composite setting.

references.paper_title: Dual averaging method for regularized stochastic learning and online optimization
references.reason: This paper introduces the dual averaging method, another fundamental algorithm for online composite optimization that this paper builds upon.

references.paper_title: An optimal method for stochastic composite optimization
references.reason: This paper provides optimal regret bounds for stochastic composite optimization, which this paper aims to extend and generalize.
